TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ProfileProvider extends System.Configuration.SettingsProvider
Public MustInherit Class ProfileProvider Inherits SettingsProvider
public ref class ProfileProvider abstract : System::Configuration::SettingsProvider

summary.span: 定义 ASP.NET 为使用自定义配置文件提供程序提供配置文件服务而实现的协定。

span.span: Defines the contract that ASP.NET implements to provide profile services using custom profile providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 配置文件提供持久存储和检索的特定于用户的属性。ASP.NET profiles offer persistent storage and retrieval of user-specific properties. 配置文件属性值和信息将存储在中确定的方式的数据源实现。Profile property values and information are stored in a data source in a manner determined by the implementation. 你可以使用.NET Framework 附带的配置文件提供程序 (由派生自的类表示抽象类)，或者可以通过创建一个新的类派生自实现自己的提供程序。You can use the profile providers that are included with the .NET Framework (represented by the classes that derive from the abstract class), or you can implement your own provider by creating a new class that derives from . 有两个主要原因创建自定义配置文件提供程序。There are two primary reasons for creating a custom profile provider. - 你需要将配置文件信息存储在.NET Framework 中，如 FoxPro 数据库、 Oracle 数据库或其他数据存储中包含的配置文件提供程序不支持的数据源。You need to store profile information in a data source that is not supported by the profile providers included with the .NET Framework, such as a FoxPro database, an Oracle database, or other data stores. - 你需要管理使用的是不同于使用.NET Framework 会随附的提供程序的数据库架构的数据库架构的配置文件信息。You need to manage profile information using a database schema that is different from the database schema used by the providers that ship with the .NET Framework. 常见的示例将为公司网络或网站的 SQL Server 数据库中已存在的用户数据。A common example of this would be user data that already exists in a SQL Server database for a company network or a Web site. 抽象类继承自抽象类，该类继承自抽象类。The abstract class inherits from the abstract class, which inherits from the abstract class. 类实现还必须实现的所需的成员和抽象类。Classes that implement must also implement the required members of the and abstract classes. 有关实现配置文件提供程序的详细信息，请参阅[实现配置文件提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。For more information about implementing a profile provider, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98). ## Examples 有关的示例实现，请参阅[如何： 生成并运行配置文件提供程序示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa)。For an example of a implementation, see [How to: Build and Run the Profile Provider Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa).

MemberSignature.Value: protected ProfileProvider ();
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Protected Sub New ()
protected: ProfileProvider();

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不需要实现继承的类的构造函数抽象类。You are not required to implement a constructor for a class that inherits the abstract class. 值初始化实现传递给方法实现。Initialization values for a implementation are passed to the method implementation.

param.name: authenticationOption
param.span: 值之一，指定是删除匿名配置文件、已验证的配置文件还是同时删除这两种类型的配置文件。

span.span: One of the values, specifying whether anonymous, authenticated, or both types of profiles are deleted.

param.name: userInactiveSinceDate
param.span: 一个 ，确定将哪些用户配置文件视为处于不活动状态。

span.span: A that identifies which user profiles are considered inactive.

param.span: 如果用户配置文件的 值与此日期和时间相同，或在此日期和时间之前，则此配置文件被视为处于不活动状态。

span.span: If the value of a user profile occurs on or before this date and time, the profile is considered inactive.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写后，此方法删除最后一次活动在指定日期之前发生的配置文件的所有用户配置文件数据。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, deletes all user-profile data for profiles in which the last activity date occurred before the specified date.

returns.span: 从数据源中删除的配置文件的数目。

span.span: The number of profiles deleted from the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于从数据源中删除未使用的配置文件数据。The method is used to remove unused profile data from the data source. 仅数据`applicationName`配置中指定删除文件。Only data for the `applicationName` specified in the configuration file is removed. `authenticationOption`参数指定是否仅匿名配置文件，仅当身份验证配置文件，或所有配置文件中搜索。The `authenticationOption` parameter specifies whether only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles are searched. 在其中的配置文件发生指定日期或之前指定`userInactiveSinceDate`参数值会删除。Profiles in which the occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value are deleted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的实现的方法签名方法。The following code example shows the method signature for an implementation of the method. 有关完整的示例实现，请参阅[如何： 生成并运行配置文件提供程序示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa)。For an example of a full implementation, see [How to: Build and Run the Profile Provider Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法删除的配置文件中指定`profiles`参数。The method deletes the profiles specified in the `profiles` parameter. 仅数据`applicationName`配置中指定删除文件。Only data for the `applicationName` specified in the configuration file is removed. 当在派生类中实现此方法，可以使用`applicationName`值和每个属性中所提供对象来确定要从您的数据源中删除的配置文件。When implementing this method in a derived class, you can use the `applicationName` value and the property of each object in the supplied to determine which profiles to delete from your data source. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的实现的方法签名方法。The following code example shows the method signature for an implementation of the method. 有关完整的示例实现，请参阅[如何： 生成并运行配置文件提供程序示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa)。For an example of a full implementation, see [How to: Build and Run the Profile Provider Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa). summary.span: 在派生类中重写后，此方法检索最后一次活动在指定日期或指定日期之前发生并且用户名与指定用户名相匹配的配置文件的配置文件信息。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, retrieves profile information for profiles in which the last activity date occurred on or before the specified date and the user name matches the specified user name.

returns.span: 包含不活动配置文件的用户配置文件信息的 ，这些不活动配置文件中的用户名与提供的 参数相匹配。

span.span: A containing user profile information for inactive profiles where the user name matches the supplied parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于检索配置文件中的用户名与匹配所提供的未使用的用户配置文件的配置文件信息`usernameToMatch`参数。The method is used to retrieve profile information for unused user profiles for profiles in which the user name matches the supplied `usernameToMatch` parameter. 仅数据`applicationName`配置中指定文件返回。Only data for the `applicationName` specified in the configuration file is returned. `authenticationOption`参数指定是否仅匿名配置文件，仅当身份验证配置文件，或所有配置文件中搜索。The `authenticationOption` parameter specifies whether only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles are searched. 搜索的配置文件，所有与配置文件发生这种情况是日期或之前指定`userInactiveSinceDate`返回参数值。Of the searched profiles, any profile with a that occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value is returned. 如果您的数据源支持附加搜索功能，如通配符字符，你可以为用户名称提供更广泛搜索功能。If your data source supports additional search capabilities, such as wildcard characters, you can provide more extensive search capabilities for user names. 返回的结果受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`参数。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`参数标识的最大数对象中返回。The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`参数标识要返回，其中零标识的第一页的结果页。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return, where zero identifies the first page. `totalRecords`参数是`out`参数设置为已配置的非活动状态的用户配置文件的总数`applicationName`，具体取决`authenticationOption`和`userInactiveSinceDate`参数。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the configured `applicationName`, based on the `authenticationOption` and `userInactiveSinceDate` parameters. 例如，如果有 13 个用户配置的`applicationName`，和`pageIndex`值为 1`pageSize`为 5，返回将包含到返回的第十个不活动配置文件的第六个。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned would contain the sixth through the tenth inactive profiles returned. `totalRecords`参数将设置为 13。The `totalRecords` parameter would be set to 13. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的实现的方法签名方法。The following code example shows the method signature for an implementation of the method. 有关完整的示例实现，请参阅[如何： 生成并运行配置文件提供程序示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa)。For an example of a full implementation, see [How to: Build and Run the Profile Provider Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回的配置文件中的用户名与匹配所提供的配置文件信息的列表`usernameToMatch`参数。The method returns a list of profile information for profiles in which the user name matches the supplied `usernameToMatch` parameter. 仅数据`applicationName`配置中指定文件返回。Only data for the `applicationName` specified in the configuration file is returned. `authenticationOption`参数指定是否仅匿名配置文件，仅当身份验证配置文件，或所有配置文件中搜索。The `authenticationOption` parameter specifies whether only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles are searched. 如果您的数据源支持附加搜索功能，如通配符字符，你可以为用户名称提供更广泛搜索功能。If your data source supports additional search capabilities, such as wildcard characters, you can provide more extensive search capabilities for user names. 返回的结果受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`参数。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`参数标识的最大数对象中返回。The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`参数标识要返回，其中零标识的第一页的结果页。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return, where zero identifies the first page. `totalRecords`参数是`out`参数设置为已配置的非活动状态的用户配置文件的总数`applicationName`，具体取决`authenticationOption`和`userInactiveSinceDate`参数。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the configured `applicationName`, based on the `authenticationOption` and `userInactiveSinceDate` parameters. 例如，如果有 13 个用户配置的`applicationName`，和`pageIndex`值为 1`pageSize`为 5，返回将包含到返回的第十个不活动配置文件的第六个。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned would contain the sixth through the tenth inactive profiles returned. `totalRecords`参数将设置为 13。The `totalRecords` parameter would be set to 13. ## returns.span: 包含有关不活动配置文件的用户配置文件信息的 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于检索的未使用的用户配置文件的配置文件信息。The method is used to retrieve profile information for unused user profiles. 仅数据`applicationName`配置中指定文件返回。Only data for the `applicationName` specified in the configuration file is returned. `authenticationOption`参数指定是否仅匿名配置文件，仅当身份验证配置文件，或所有配置文件中搜索。The `authenticationOption` parameter specifies whether only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles are searched. 搜索的配置文件，所有与配置文件发生这种情况是日期或之前指定`userInactiveSinceDate`返回参数值。Of the searched profiles, any profile with a that occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value is returned. 返回的结果受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`参数。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`参数标识的最大数对象中返回。The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`参数标识要返回，其中零标识的第一页的结果页。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return, where zero identifies the first page. `totalRecords`参数是`out`参数设置为已配置的非活动状态的用户配置文件的总数`applicationName`，具体取决`authenticationOption`和`userInactiveSinceDate`参数。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the configured `applicationName`, based on the `authenticationOption` and `userInactiveSinceDate` parameters. 例如，如果有 13 个用户配置的`applicationName`，和`pageIndex`值为 1`pageSize`为 5，返回将包含到返回的第十个不活动配置文件的第六个。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned would contain the sixth through the tenth inactive profiles returned. `totalRecords`参数将设置为 13。The `totalRecords` parameter would be set to 13. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的实现的方法签名方法。The following code example shows the method signature for an implementation of the method. 有关完整的示例实现，请参阅[如何： 生成并运行配置文件提供程序示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa)。For an example of a full implementation, see [How to: Build and Run the Profile Provider Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于检索的所有配置文件的配置文件信息。The method is used to retrieve profile information for all profiles. 仅数据`applicationName`配置中指定文件返回。Only data for the `applicationName` specified in the configuration file is returned. `authenticationOption`参数指定是否仅匿名配置文件，仅当身份验证配置文件，或所有配置文件中搜索。The `authenticationOption` parameter specifies whether only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles are searched. 返回的结果受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`参数。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`参数标识的最大数对象中返回。The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`参数标识要返回，其中零标识的第一页的结果页。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return, where zero identifies the first page. `totalRecords`参数是`out`参数设置为已配置的非活动状态的用户配置文件的总数`applicationName`，具体取决`authenticationOption`和`userInactiveSinceDate`参数。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the configured `applicationName`, based on the `authenticationOption` and `userInactiveSinceDate` parameters. 例如，如果有 13 个用户配置的`applicationName`，和`pageIndex`值为 1`pageSize`为 5，返回将包含到返回的第十个不活动配置文件的第六个。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned would contain the sixth through the tenth inactive profiles returned. `totalRecords`参数将设置为 13。The `totalRecords` parameter would be set to 13. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的实现的方法签名方法。The following code example shows the method signature for an implementation of the method. 有关完整的示例实现，请参阅[如何： 生成并运行配置文件提供程序示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa)。For an example of a full implementation, see [How to: Build and Run the Profile Provider Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa). span.span: A that identifies which user profiles are considered inactive.

param.span: 如果用户配置文件的 与此日期和时间相同，或在此日期和时间之前，则此配置文件被视为处于不活动状态。

span.span: If the of a user profile occurs on or before this date and time, the profile is considered inactive.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写后，此方法返回最后一次活动在指定日期或指定日期之前发生的配置文件的数目。

returns.span: 最后一次活动在指定日期或指定日期之前发生的配置文件的数目。

span.span: The number of profiles in which the last activity date occurred on or before the specified date.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于检索所有未使用的用户配置文件的计数。The method is used to retrieve a count of all unused user profiles. 仅数据`applicationName`配置中指定文件返回。Only data for the `applicationName` specified in the configuration file is returned. `authenticationOption`参数指定是否仅匿名配置文件，仅当身份验证配置文件，或所有配置文件中搜索。The `authenticationOption` parameter specifies whether only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles are searched. 搜索的配置文件，所有与配置文件发生这种情况是日期或之前指定`userInactiveSinceDate`计数参数值。Of the searched profiles, any profile with a that occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value is counted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的实现的方法签名方法。The following code example shows the method signature for an implementation of the method. 有关完整的示例实现，请参阅[如何： 生成并运行配置文件提供程序示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa)。For an example of a full implementation, see [How to: Build and Run the Profile Provider Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa).
